comment: She's very passionate about this class, which is a good trait but it's a little overwhelming. She starts the class off with a motivational speech which lasts through most of class, which helps time fly by. She's a nice woman, but she is very strict about attendance. If you come in late or not at all a lot, then you will NOT pass. Its an easy A.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Inspirational

comment: Really nice teacher. However, you won't get a good grade if you skip which is dumb. Don't recommend unless you go to class the whole semester. Easy work just attendance policy sucks.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She seriously sucks!!! She isnt a teacher just a motivational speaker who never shuts up. She acts like she is better than everyone and is not easy to work with. I have more work/projects in her class than any of my other classes. Would not recommend by any means.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Easy A but the busy work, presentations and essays pile up fast. That being said, from what I hear she is much better than other seminar teachers. She is very nice and caring so if you can get past the annoying workload outside of class, in-class is a very nice time to nap or study before other classes
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Caring

comment: Her class was a very easy A. Lots of group projects though which were kind of annoying and every two classes you miss, she docks you a letter grade on your final grade, but she is very caring and you can tell she wants to help students.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Several group projects, a speech assignment, and quizzes that are taken online are a few of the assignments in the class. Very easy class, and she is very caring and an easy grader.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She takes the class way too seriously and overwhelms freshman. Her class is nothing like what college is like, especially if you take large classes. Work is unnecessary and annoying. Makes you do an awful speech assignment.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Professor White-Johnson was very talkative during her classes, but she was extremely caring and nice. This class makes you do a lot of group projects.

she gives open note/book tests but they're NOT easy and they're all online and timed usually for 50 minutes. Also she doesn't really teach much so you really don't learn anything there's a lot of random videos and you must learn outside of class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She's terrible. Out of my political science, math class, and Spanish class.. she assigns the most work. The work is ridiculous and unnecessary. This is supposed to be an easy A class. It's just a seminar class. She takes it too serious. She has a smart mouth and is sometimes very aggravating.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS
